Name: Limiting the time period for parking at parking meters.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to limiting the time period for parking at parking meters.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1.  Title 19 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 19-167.2 to read as follows:
	§ 19-167.2  Maximum parking time at parking meters.  The maximum time period allowed at a parking space regulated by a parking meter shall be four hours.
§ 2.  This local law shall take effect ninety days after its enactment. 

LS 724
PH
5/18/10 - 11:40 am
